description: Time to get at some of those richer rocks.
Advanced ores will need to be /6/Crushed/6/, then /6/Melted/6/ into /b/molten slurries/b/. Put the slurry in a /b/Centrifuge/b/ to seperate the /b/Slag/b/, then /6/pour out into a cast/6/.
The /b/Slag Runoff/b/ can be /6/Centrifuged/6/ to recycle it.
This will process /6/Pentlandite, Bauxite, Malachite, Hematite/6/

/b/Bauxite/b/ and /b/Malachite/b/ yield /b/Iron/b/ and /b/Copper/b/ respectively. They can be found in the /c/Nether/c/ and are far /6/more common and mineral-rich/6/ than their overworld counterparts. Risk for reward.
